description:
The magic contest is on! Selen faces Phyllo, Lloyd fights Mena, and Riho is prepared to settle her old grudge with Rol.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Suppose the Obviously Superior Contestant Wins, but the Clearly Inferior Contestant Also Wins?
Tatoeba Zettai Katsu Daroutte Yatsu ga Katte, Zettai Makeru Daroutte Yatsu mo Katsu You na Kouryuujiai no Kaishi
たとえば絶対勝つだろうってやつが勝って, 絶対負けるだろうってやつも勝つような交流試合の開始
